title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support, file uploads and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama with ActiveRecord-like syntax.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama allowing users to chat with local LLMs via Slack.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing code against local LLMs.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, and advanced patterns.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to Ollama with streaming and session memory.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Minimal Bash wrapper exposing Ollama REST endpoints with curl examples and jq parsing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio.
